application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x whitebeam (140): crown lift to 3m over pavement and prune to clear lamppost/sign by 1m.1 x fastigiate apple (159): crown lift to 4m over shrub bed, pruning small diameter branches only no greater than 3cm diameter.1 x silver birch (194): crown lift to 3m over pavement and prune to clear lamppost/sign by 1m1 x silver birch (195): prune to clear lamppost/sign by 1m1 x silver birch (196): crown lift to 3m over pavement1 x Calabrian pine (200): crown lift over adjacent Magnolia to achieve 2m clearance.1 x Calabrian pine (203): fell1 x Calabrian pine (204): crown lift over adjacent palm to achieve 2m clearance1 x Chusan palm (205): crown lift over adjacent palm and Magnolia to achieve 2m clearance1 x alder: remove two stems interfering with crown of adjacent Magnolia 1 x Cotinus (213): Crown lift to 2m over shrub bed1 x birch (216): crown lift over adjacent Loquat to achieve 2m clearance1 x goat willow (224): crown lift over adjacent Loquat to achieve 2m clearance.  Crown lift to 4m over road1 x goat willow (225): crown lift to 4m over road1 x lime (226): crown lift to 6m over lawn1 x lime (227): remove epicormic growth
